name: Bearly Legal
description: We made this project as a meme inspired by Elon Musk’s Path of Exile 2 character, Bearly Legal. We enjoy supporting Elon and gaming culture, and we think it’s genuinely cool to see that even a billionaire still makes time to play games online. For us, it’s a fun reminder that gaming connects people from all backgrounds through shared passion and creativity. This token is created by fans and has nothing to do with Elon Musk
